hours_text:
Discover Your Place In Time

## **VISIT OUR MUSEUMS**

The Pejepscot History Center, Brunswick, Maine, owns and operates two historic house museums (Joshua L. Chamberlain Museum and the Skolfield-Whittier House), a regional history museum of rotating exhibits, and a research center, providing access to historic documents.

Please scroll down for information on each property. We look forward to seeing you soon!

#### **The Joshua L.**  
**Chamberlain Museum**

[Book Now](http://web.archive.org/web/20250914055359/https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/pejepscothistorycenter/items/466551/?full-items=yes&flow=970544)

[MORE INFO](http://web.archive.org/web/20250914055359/https://pejepscothistorical.org/visit/#jlcm)

#### **The Pejepscot**  
**Museum**

[MORE INFO](http://web.archive.org/web/20250914055359/https://pejepscothistorical.org/visit/#pm)

#### **The Skolfield-**  
**Whittier Museum**

[Book Now](http://web.archive.org/web/20250914055359/https://fareharbor.com/embeds/book/pejepscothistorycenter/items/466589/?full-items=yes&flow=970544)

[MORE INFO](http://web.archive.org/web/20250914055359/https://pejepscothistorical.org/visit/#swh)

##  [Preservation Party a Success!](http://web.archive.org/web/20251010095746/https://pejepscothistorical.org/preservation-party/)

Preservation Party A Success! On August 15, PHC held its Preservation Party at Skyline Farm in North Yarmouth to support conservation and new cases for Joshua Chamberlain’s saddle and Gettysburg boots. More than 90 people attended the event, enjoying Skyline’s...

Discover Your Place In Time

Pejepscot History Center, the fourth oldest local history organization in the State of Maine, tells the stories of Brunswick, Topsham, and Harpswell.

Our two house museums, just a six-minute walk apart, bring the 19th century to life. Seasoned docents share stories for visitors young and old, revealing how history influences our lives today.

[LEARN MORE](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105125142/https://pejepscothistorical.org/visit/)

### VISIT OUR LOCATIONS:

#### The Joshua L.  
Chamberlain Museum

226 Maine St  
Brunswick, ME 04011

_By Private Tour Only until May 2026  
(No private tours in January)_

[Private Tours](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105125142/https://secure.lglforms.com/form_engine/s/U-q8DTFzD6BpDGxjwht95g)

[LEARN MORE](http://web.archive.org/web/20260105125142/https://pejepscothistorical.org/visit/the-joshua-l-chamberlain-museum/)

Museum

Brunswick, ME 04011
